meanings.definition: Not relating to or involving chemicals.
meanings.sent1: The garden used nonchemical methods to control pests.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonchemical cleaning products for her home.
meanings.sent3: The nonchemical approach to gardening kept the environment safe.
meanings.sent4: His nonchemical solution to the problem was surprisingly effective.
meanings.sent5: The nonchemical treatment for the stain worked wonders.

meanings.definition: Not of or relating to chemicals.
meanings.sent1: The company promoted nonchemical solutions for skincare.
meanings.sent2: They advocated for nonchemical additives in food products.
meanings.sent3: The nonchemical makeup remover was gentle on the skin.
meanings.sent4: Her nonchemical hair dye was a hit among customers.
meanings.sent5: The nonchemical sunscreen protected her skin from the sun.

meanings.definition: Not produced by or involving chemicals.
meanings.sent1: The nonchemical fertilizer was safe for the environment.
meanings.sent2: He preferred nonchemical methods for water purification.
meanings.sent3: The nonchemical scent of the flowers was refreshing.
meanings.sent4: The nonchemical process preserved the natural flavor of the fruit.
meanings.sent5: Using nonchemical materials, the artist created a unique painting.
